paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted BRCA2 variant information including penetrance data from a study on consanguinity and breast cancer in Southern Mediterranean populations.

functional_data.summary: Frameshift mutation leading to a truncated protein.

variants.segregation_data: Segregates with disease in sporadic cases.
variants.additional_notes: Detected in sporadic breast cancer cases.
key_quotes: three deleterious mutations, c.6591_6592del (exon11), c.1310_1313del (exon10) and c.7654dup (exon16) have been detected among the 51 sporadic cases (5.88%)

functional_data.summary: Novel frameshift mutation leading to a truncated protein.

variants.segregation_data: Segregates with disease in familial cases.
variants.additional_notes: Novel mutation confirmed by direct sequencing.
key_quotes: A novel mutation was revealed in a familial case that has been confirmed by direct sequencing. It consists of duplication c.9382_9383dup located in exon 25

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant BRCA2 variants were extracted successfully.
